# Documentation: cornfab

## add_history_entry

### Add entry to history

#### Description

Add entry to history

#### Usage

```r
add_history_entry(history, entry)
```

#### Arguments

- **`history`**: Current history list.
- **`entry`**: New entry to add.


## app_server

### App Server

#### Description

Server logic for the Cornfab Shiny app.

#### Usage

```r
app_server(input, output, session)
```

#### Arguments

- **`input`**: Shiny input object.
- **`output`**: Shiny output object.
- **`session`**: Shiny session object.

#### Value

NULL (side effects only).


## app_ui

### App UI

#### Description

Create the Cornfab Shiny app user interface.

#### Usage

```r
app_ui()
```

#### Value

A Shiny UI object.


## audio_dir

### Get audio directory

#### Description

Get audio directory

#### Usage

```r
audio_dir()
```


## create_history_entry

### Create a new history entry

#### Description

Create a new history entry

#### Usage

```r
create_history_entry(text, voice, backend, model = NULL, audio_file = NULL)
```

#### Arguments

- **`text`**: Input text.
- **`voice`**: Voice used.
- **`backend`**: Backend used.
- **`model`**: Model used (if any).
- **`audio_file`**: Path to audio file (optional).


## delete_history_entry

### Delete history entry

#### Description

Delete history entry

#### Usage

```r
delete_history_entry(history, id)
```

#### Arguments

- **`history`**: Current history list.
- **`id`**: Entry ID to delete.

### Format timestamp for display

#### Description

Format timestamp for display

#### Usage

```r
format_timestamp(timestamp)
```

#### Arguments

- **`timestamp`**: POSIXct timestamp.

### Get history directory

Get history directory

history_dir()

## history

### History Persistence Functions

#### Description

Functions for managing TTS generation history.


## load_history

### Load history from disk

#### Description

Load history from disk

#### Usage

```r
load_history()
```


## run_app

### Run the Cornfab App

#### Description

Launch the Cornfab text-to-speech Shiny application.

#### Usage

```r
run_app(host = "0.0.0.0", port = 7803, ...)
```

#### Arguments

- **`host`**: Host address to bind to. Defaults to "0.0.0.0" for network access.
- **`port`**: Port number. Defaults to 7803.
- **`...`**: Additional arguments passed to shiny::runApp().

#### Value

Runs the Shiny app (does not return).

#### Examples

```r
run_app()
run_app(port = 8080)
```


## save_audio_file

### Save audio file to history

#### Description

Save audio file to history

#### Usage

```r
save_audio_file(audio_data, entry_id, format = "wav")
```

#### Arguments

- **`audio_data`**: Raw audio bytes.
- **`entry_id`**: History entry ID.
- **`format`**: Audio format (wav, mp3).


## save_history

### Save history to disk

#### Description

Save history to disk

#### Usage

```r
save_history(history)
```

#### Arguments

- **`history`**: List of history entries.


## truncate_text

### Truncate text for preview

#### Description

Truncate text for preview

#### Usage

```r
truncate_text(text, max_length = 50)
```

#### Arguments

- **`text`**: Text to truncate.
- **`max_length`**: Maximum length.
